attributes.title: Rethinking PID Registration
attributes.description: Presentation given at the PIDapalooza conference on 24 January 2018. In this session, I will propose a new workflow for PID registration that does not involve any API calls or web form submissions by the registering party. DOIs for science blogs are used as an example and good fit for this new workflow. We will have a working prototype by February and invite interested parties to bring their science blog for DOI-fication to the beta test we will then start.
